fields.description:
Customer needs an native system iOS style button style of back. Not the button, like leftnavbutton, which is just a button.

Basically, he wants to add back property to http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.iPhone.SystemButtonStyle-object.html
fields.summary: iOS: Need the iOS back STYLE button

Titanium SDK: Mobile 1.8.0.1
Platform OS: iOS
Platform OS Version: 5.01
